characters.name: Daenerys Targaryen
characters.title: Queen of Meereen and Mother of Dragons
characters.quote: I will take what is mine with blood and fire.

characters.name: Jon Snow
characters.title: Lord Commander of the Night's Watch
characters.quote: Night gathers, and now my watch begins.

characters.name: Tyrion Lannister
characters.title: Hand of the King and Master of Coin
characters.quote: A Lannister always pays his debts.

characters.name: Tywin Lannister
characters.title: Wormchow
characters.quote: You cannot eat love, nor buy a horse with it, nor warm your halls on a cold night.

characters.name: Cersei Lannister
characters.title: King Mother and Lady of Casterly Rock
characters.quote: The gods have no mercy, that’s why they’re gods.

characters.name: Robb Stark
characters.title: Deceased
characters.quote: It was the only honorable thing to do.
